name: Bigboss Slider
author: Bulbul bigboss

sections.description:
Bigboss slider for creating the Modern slideshow in any area of your WordPress sites like in post page or sidebar area. responsive Custom post type slider, easy to use, install and customize.

used this shortcode ” [bigboss_slider] ” in page or post
or used this ” < ?php bigboss_slider() ; ? > ” php code in template .

::How to use Bigboss slider click see the video Tutorials
Bigboss slider uses

Live demo click here

If you face any problem then contact with me or see more about
bigboss slider plugin

Basic Use

then go to bigboss slider > add new bigboss slider > add your slider title > slider content > and uploader your slider image
and publish it .

if you face any problem then please contact with me https://www.facebook.com/bulbulbigbossbd

Call in Template

Use this php code <?php bigboss_slider() ; ?>
sections.installation:
How To install Bigboss slider plugin on your wordpress site
1.Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

2.Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

3.use this code ” < ?php bigboss_slider() ; ? > ” to show up slider
plugin in your template .

4.or your can used this shortcode ” [bigboss_slider] ” to add slider on page/post
sections.faq:
How Call this in template?

use <?php bigboss_slider() ; ?> to call bigboss slider in template.

What is the shortcode of this plugin ?

Short code : [bigboss_slider]

If You have any problem

if you face any problem using Bigboss cpt post widget plugin then please ask question to me

How To Use This Plugin

Check The Instalattion guideline
